title: AutoFocus
description: This element describes one or more optional focus stabilization device(s) available for this instrument.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This describes the manufacturer specifications for this component (i.e., manufacturer name, model designation and serial number).
subCategoriesOrder.AutoFocus: This element describes one or more optional focus stabilization device(s) available for this instrument.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

Type.description: The type of this autofocus device.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
